data.title: Plagiaulacidae
data.text:
Mikko's Phylogeny Archive

Main Groups of Non-Therian Mammals

Plagiaulacidae

After McKenna & Bell, 1997

<==o †Plagiaulacidae Gill, 1872 [incl. Paulchoffatiidae Hahn, 1969] |--o †Paulchoffatia Kühne, 1961 | |-- †P. delgadoi Kühne, 1961 | `-- †P. sp. |--o †Kuehneodon Hahn, G., 1969 | |-- †K. dietrichi Hahn, G., 1969 | |-- †K. dryas Hahn, 1977 | |-- †K. simpsoni Hahn, 1969 | |-- †K. guimarotensis Hahn, 1969 | `-- †K. uniradiculatus Hahn, 1978 |--o †Henkelodon Hahn, G., 1969 [1977?] | |-- †H. naias Hahn, 1977 | `?- †H. guimarotensis [Kuehneodon guimarotensis Hahn, 1969??] |-- †Meketichoffatia krausei Hahn, 1993 |-- †Kielanodon hopsoni Hahn, G., 1987 |-- †Bathmochoffatia hapax Hahn & Hahn, 1998 |-- †Guimarotodon leiriensisHahn, G., 1969 |--o †Plesiochoffatia Hahn & Hahn, 1999 | |-- †P. thoas (Hahn & Hahn, 1998) | |-- †P. staphylos (Hahn & Hahn, 1998) | `-- †P. peparethos (hahn & Hahn, 1998) |-- †Xenachoffatia oinopion Hahn & Hahn, 1998 |--o †Pseudobolodon Hahn, G., 1977 | |-- †P. oreas Hahn, G., 1977 | `-- †P. krebsi Hahn, G. & Hahn, R., 1994 |--o †Meketibolodon Hahn, G., 1993 | `-- †M. robustus (Hahn, 1978) |--o †Ctenacodon Marsh, 1879 | |-- †C. brentbaatar | |-- †C. nanus Marsh, 1881 | |-- †C. laticeps (Marsh, 1881) | |-- †C. scindens Simpson, 1928 | |-- †C. serratus Marsh, 1879 [type of genus?] | `?- †C. falconeri [=? Plagiaulax falconeri] |--o †Psalodon Simpson, 1926 | |-- †P. fortis (Marsh, 1887) [Allodon fortis Marsh, 1887] | |-- †P. potens (Marsh, 1887) [Ctenacodon potens Marsh, 1887] | `?- †P. marshi Simpson, 1929 |--o †Plagiaulax Falconer, 1857 | |-- †P. becklesii | |?- †P. dawsoni Woodward, 1891 [Nomen nudum] | `-- †P. sp. |-- †Zofiabaatar Bakker & Carpenter, 1990 |-- †Calveodon Hahn & Hahn, 1992 |-- †Lavocatia alfambrensis Canudo & Cuenca-Bescós, 1996 |-- †Sunnyodon Kielan-Jaworowska & Ensom, 1992 |-- †Gerhardodon Kielan-Jaworowska & Ensom, 1992 `?- †Parendotherium herreroi Crusafont Pairó & Adrover, 1966 [a Bolodontid?? (McKenna & Bell, 1997)]
